argument.name: Event_Name
argument.description: The name of an event in the Xdialog script.

sections.description: The {On_Clipboard_Change} command fires the specified event, when the contents of the clipboard changes.

section.title: Example
section.example:
dim clipb as C = "" clipb = ""
dlg_title = "Clipboard watcher" ui_modeless_dlg_box(dlg_title,<<%dlg% {on_clipboard_change=clip} [%M%.50,30clipb]; <&Close!close> %dlg%,<<%code% if a_dlg_button = "close" .or. a_dlg_button = "" then a_dlg_button = "" ui_modeless_dlg_close(dlg_title) else if a_dlg_button = "clip" a_dlg_button = "" if clipboard.Has_Data()

section.description: You only want to respond to clipboard events if text was placed onto the clipboard. If, for example, a bitmap was placed on the clipboard, you want to ignore it. clipboard.Has_Data()(with no arguments) will return TRUE (.T.) if the clipboard contains text.
